recommendations: Kriti Srivastava â€œApekshit is really dynamic when it comes to diving into product puzzles, understanding business needs and providing solutions to clients. He is a self driven person who brings phenomenal energy to the team. I fully recommend him for his product management and business analysis skills. He is a great communicator too which just adds on to all the good things he brings to any organisational set up.â€

Naggappan Ramasamy â€œApekshith was one of my student / learner in the Product Management Program at Growth School. From day one, I was amused by his dedication, hard work and consistency in learning and writing on Product Management. He is super talented, great thinker and has high agency. It is difficult to see someone with a mix of skill and agency. He writes a lot about Product Management and has inspired other students in the cohort to write as well. He is always there to help his fellow Product Aspirants. I should say that I was gifted to mentor a student like him and people like him inspire you to teach more :) All the best man! You will reach great heights!â€

volunteer_experience.info: - I was the member of Leo Club Waknaghat for 4 years during my graduation. - During my tenure as Leo Club President, I worked with my team of 150+ volunteers to address social causes like Children Education, Senior Citizens well-being, and Rural areas upliftment. - Our team also organized numerous donation drives throughout Himachal Pradesh. - In 2014, we organized our parent district's biggest Blood Donation Drive which got recognition from HP Public and Health Authorities.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Lions Clubs International
volunteer_experience.title: President - Leo Waknaghat

volunteer_experience.info: - I led a team of 30 students to oversee College Cultural Events and ensured smooth operations of student's activities. - I was a part of organizing committee for JUIT's annual fest for 2 consecutive years during which our responsibilities included managing 2500+ students, university staff, finance and events.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: JUIT Youth Club, JYC
volunteer_experience.title: Student Coordinator
